abstract.text: Join us for an exciting update to RoomPlan as we explore MultiRoom support and enhancements to room representations. Learn how you can scan areas with more detail, capture multiple rooms, and merge individual scans into one larger structure. We‚Äôll also share workflows and best practices when working with RoomPlan results that you want to combine into your existing 3D model library.

abstract.text: RoomPlan can help your app quickly create simplified parametric 3D scans of a room. Learn how you can use this API to easily add a room scanning experience. We‚Äôll show you how to adopt this API, explore the 3D parametric output, and share best practices to help your app get great results with every scan.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Create parametric 3D room scans with RoomPlan

abstract.text: Session notes shared by the community for the community.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Discover Quick Look for spatial computing

abstract.text: Learn how to use Quick Look on visionOS to add powerful previews for 3D content, spatial images and videos, and much more. We‚Äôll show you the different ways that the system presents these experiences, demonstrate how someone can drag and drop Quick Look content from an app or website to create a separate window with that content, and explore how you can present Quick Look directly within an app.
Xcode 15, Swift 5.9, iOS 17, macOS 14 (Sonoma), tvOS 17, visionOS 1, watchOS 10.
